name: Closers: Platinum Pack
detailed_description:
The Closers Platinum Pack contains a selection of useful items for defending our dimension from monstrous invaders! Here’s what’s inside:

  • Dark Command costume (6-piece set)
  • Dark Command Accessory Random Box
  • 30-Day Elite Status Voucher ×3—Get the most out of Closers with 90 days of elite status!
  • 30-Day Maid Service Voucher ×3—Improve your explorations for 90 days!
  • 30-Day Gardening Voucher ×3—Increase the number of times you can plant seeds…and get a free Rainbow Seed each day!
  • Panda Pajamas costume
  • Visual Slot Expansion Set—Unlock all 16 visual slots!
  • +1 Gear Booster—Instantly increase the enhancement level of an item by 1!
  • +13 Gear Booster Pouch—Enhance your key gear to +13 in one go!
  • Mini Awakened Tiamat Pet package—Get the best pet in Closers!
  • Royal Winter Phase Wings (C)

short_description: Closers: Platinum PackThe Platinum Pack contains a selection of choice Closers gear, including:Full Dark Command costume and accessories set30-Day Elite Status, Maid Service, and Gardening VouchersMini Awakened Tiamat pet packageand more!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel/AMD Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 7600
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 8000
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
